body:
--------------F3A641E3F79B91B6ABFFD5E8 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1 Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64 Greg Ward wrote: Yeap, - the 'reply' button is somewhat a missing feature in mailman's archives. We'll see what mailman 2.1 offers (it's currently alpha). Yet I found this mailing list manager more useful and flexible than other software. My personal schedule is to do the upgrade of the software used to run the radiance-online site once a number of new versions for the packages are released, presumably late summer 2001. Once we accumulated more knowledge onsite, we'll either have a search function for the archive or a FAQ generator. If anyone has suggestions what features to add to this site, please let me know. -Peter -- Peter Apian-Bennewitz apian@ise.fhg.de +49-761-4588-[123|302] Fraunhofer Institute for Solar Energy Systems, D-79100 Freiburg --------------F3A641E3F79B91B6ABFFD5E8 Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Greg Ward wrote:
I don't know quite how to reply to a thread to get the subject right, so
I entered this manually and it may end up in the wrong place.  (Help, Peter!)
Yeap, - the 'reply' button is somewhat a missing feature in mailman's archives. We'll see
what mailman 2.1 offers (it's currently alpha). Yet I found this mailing list manager more
useful and flexible than other software. My personal schedule is to do the upgrade of the software
used to run the radiance-online site once a number of new versions for the packages are released,
presumably late summer 2001. Once we accumulated more knowledge onsite, we'll either have
a search function for the archive or a FAQ generator.
If anyone has suggestions what features to add to this site, please let me know.

-Peter 

-- 
 Peter Apian-Bennewitz  apian@ise.fhg.de  +49-761-4588-[123|302] 
 Fraunhofer Institute for Solar Energy Systems, D-79100 Freiburg
  --------------F3A641E3F79B91B6ABFFD5E8--
